name: neuralnova-web
description: NeuralNova - Space Technology & Eco Tourism SaaS Platform

scripts.analyze: npm run lighthouse && echo 'Report saved to lighthouse-report.html'
scripts.compress-images: echo 'Install imagemin-cli: npm install -g imagemin-cli' && imagemin assets/images/*.{jpg,png} --out-dir=assets/images/optimized
scripts.webp: echo 'Convert images to WebP format' && echo 'Install cwebp or use online tools'
scripts.minify-css: echo 'Extract CSS and minify' && echo 'Use csso or cssnano'
scripts.test: echo 'Run performance tests' && npm run analyze

author: NeuralNova Team
